FuncDef: This command configures a TCA for the counter capturing drops or admit events due to the specified flow policer. A policer TCA can be created for traffic generated from the subscriber side of AA (from-sub) or for traffic generated from the network toward the AA subscriber (to-sub). Thecreatekeyword is mandatory when creating a policer TCA.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the flow policer, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the traffic direction. Values-from-sub, to-sub.
Keyword used to create the TCA.
